releaseNotes: Please update the app in order to start enjoying the content!
- Added Search filters you can now search by genre, country or only within movies/shows/tv channels.
- Added Dual Audio - You can now choose the audio for specific movies/shows.
- Added Resume/Pause/Cancel notification for In-App Downloader.
- Added Recently watched history in homescreen it'll automatically show after you watch and exit the movie/show.
- Added Google/Phone and Facebook login methods.
- Added New Watch History Page with Clear Option.
- Added Downloaded Content Now Available in Downloads Page.
- Improved Chromecast support and fixed Chromecast player.
